code: import React from'react';import'leaflet/dist/leaflet.css';import{MapContainer,TileLayer,GeoJSON,FeatureGroup,Popup,Polygon}from'react-leaflet';import streets from'./Main_Street_Districts.json';import boston from'./Boston_Boundary.json';import'./Map.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Map(){var districtStyle={color:"red",fillColor:"red",fillOpacity:.5,clickable:true};var bostonStyle={color:"black",fillOpacity:0};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MapContainer,{center:[42.315,-71.09],zoom:11.5,scrollWheelZoom:false,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TileLayer,{attribution:"\xA9 OpenStreetMap contributors",url:"https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GeoJSON,{style:bostonStyle,data:boston}),streets.features.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FeatureGroup,{pathOptions:districtStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Popup,{children:["Mainstreet: ",item.properties.NAME," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:item.properties.URL,children:"Click for more info"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Polygon,{positions:item.geometry.coordinates.map(function(lst){return lst.map(function(coord){return[coord[1],coord[0]];});})})]});})]})});}export default Map;
